abstract: In a deal that will allow BP to keep a crucial asset, but at a cost of ceding some control, the company came to an agreement with its Russian partners Thursday over its joint oil venture, ending months of acrimony and threats.
lead_paragraph: In a deal that will allow BP to keep a crucial asset, but at a cost of ceding some control, the company came to an agreement with its Russian partners Thursday over its joint oil venture, ending months of acrimony and threats.

headline.main: BP Makes Deep Concessions in Agreement With Russian Partner
